blogPost.excerpt: Fibery is a connected workspace for product teams. It unites user research, ideation, strategic planning, product roadmapping, software development and customer feedback aggregation. Escape scattered tools and make better products with Fibery.
blogPost.body: Fibery is a connected workspace for product teams. It unites user research, ideation, strategic planning, product roadmapping, software development and customer feedback aggregation. Escape scattered tools and make better products with Fibery.
blogPost.title: Fibery for Product Teams - All-in-one platform to invent, build and grow your products
blogPost.author: Michael Dubakov

localize.description: Fibery是一个产品团队的互联工作空间。它将用户研究、构思、战略规划、产品路线图、软件开发和客户反馈汇总等工作统一起来。摆脱分散的工具，用Fibery做出更好的产品。
localize.tagline: 一体化平台，让您发明、构建和发展您的产品。

localize.description: Fibery是一個產品團隊的互聯工作空間。它將用戶研究、構思、戰略規劃、產品路線圖、軟件開發和客戶反饋彙總等工作統一起來。擺脫分散的工具，用Fibery做出更好的產品。
localize.tagline: 一體化平臺，讓您發明、構建和發展您的產品。

previous.excerpt: The Real-time WallStreetBets sentiment tracker measures the sentiment in the reddit forum. They also track WSB market sentiment relative to market (SPY) and have a WallStreetBets Index to monitor intraday price action of popular stocks that are discussed
previous.title: r/WallStreetBets Sentiment Analysis -  Measure sentiment on the popular reddit forum

localize.description: 实时WallStreetBets情绪追踪器衡量了reddit论坛中的情绪。他们还跟踪WSB市场情绪相对于市场（SPY），并有一个WallStreetBets指数来监测讨论的热门股票的盘中价格走势。
localize.tagline: 在热门的reddit论坛上测量情绪。

localize.description: 實時WallStreetBets情緒追蹤器衡量了reddit論壇中的情緒。他們還跟蹤WSB市場情緒相對於市場（SPY），並有一個WallStreetBets指數來監測討論的熱門股票的盤中價格走勢。
localize.tagline: 在熱門的reddit論壇上測量情緒。

next.excerpt: CFO Yeah! brings you up close with finance leaders in the most exciting, fastest-growing companies in the world. In each episode, you meet CFOs who believe that finance is another key driver for growth - just as vital as sales and marketing.
next.title: CFO Yeah! - Your new favorite finance podcast

localize.description: CFO Yeah！》带您近距离接触世界上最激动人心、发展最快的公司的财务负责人。在每期节目中，您将见到那些相信财务是另一个关键的增长动力的CFO们，他们与销售和营销一样重要。
CFO Yeah！》帶您近距離接觸世界上最激動人心、發展最快的公司的財務負責人。在每期節目中，您將見到那些相信財務是另一個關鍵的增長動力的CFO們，他們與銷售和營銷一樣重要。
